name: Craftsman's Writ - Huge Thorium Battleaxe
tooltip:
Craftsman's Writ - Huge Thorium Battleaxe

Deliver 3 Huge Thorium Battleaxes and the Craftsman's Writ - Huge Thorium Battleaxe - to Packmaster Stonebruiser at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands.

Requirements:
- Huge Thorium Battleaxe x 3
